attributes.action: request the reversal of the abolition of the 10pence tax rate
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the abolition of the 10pence tax rate effectivly doubles the tax of the lower paid,people without children and anyone who does not fit the criteria to be on any type of benefit

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
